title: Anyway to counter rammus?
body: or do i just give up when i see him?

replies.body:
Well rammus is kind of a hard counter to yi

have you tried {{item:3194}} it makes his damage output 15% less on top of blocking more with he mr

No lifesteal is your problem.  As an auto attacker you need both a little magic resist and lifesteal.  This means that {{item:3139}} is probably the best possible purchase against him.  The active also allows you to cleanse his taunt in order to focus his carries instead of him.  In this case I would swap boots for merc treads and steraks for scimitar.

You had neither lifesteal nor MR so it isn't really a surprise that he'd murder you.

I'd recommend building along the following lines if you need to handle Rammus:
{{item:3006}} {{item:1419}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3194}} 

Alteratively, just swap Sterak's Gage or Guardian Angel for Mercurial Scimitar.
You can kite him,  Dps him, kill his team,  buy lifesteal, armor pen and % hp shredding,   cc him and outscale him.  all that good stuff.
i try to, but he just uses taunt, and then his team focks me
mmm... tbh, there's not too much other than build lifesteal and try to wait out his W than have fun on his behind.
please tell me you're joking? that's gonna be so cancerous

to make things more funny it also gives attackspeed slows on top

and it gets hp
No, last time I checked it was on PBE. Look up at surr20 if it's still there
